DataElement.preferredName: Telephone Device Access or Willing to Travel for Questionnaire Completion Eligibility Determination Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Yes No indicator to specify whether the participant has access to a telephone or is willing to travel to complete the study questionnaires

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Telephone Device Access or Willing to Travel for Questionnaire Completion Eligibility Determination
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to a patient or participant completing study questionnaires, a set of questions or items shown to a respondent in order to get answers for research purposes, as part of the act of determining if a subject is suitable for enrollment in a study according specific protocol criteria and procedures._A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._The quality of being able to perform; a quality that permits or facilitates achievement or accomplishment._Electronic equipment that converts sound into electrical signals that can be transmitted over distances and then converts received signals back into sounds._The right to obtain or make use of or take advantage of something (as services or membership); the right to enter.  Also, an act or means of approaching._The act of going from one place to another._Voluntary cooperation of the patient in following a prescribed regimen.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Patient Telephone Access Travel Compliance Ability
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.:Electronic equipment that converts sound into electrical signals that can be transmitted over distances and then converts received signals back into sounds.:The right to obtain or make use of or take advantage of something (as services or membership); the right to enter.  Also, an act or means of approaching.:The act of going from one place to another.:Voluntary cooperation of the patient in following a prescribed regimen.:The quality of being able to perform; a quality that permits or facilitates achievement or accomplishment.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.
Electronic equipment that converts sound into electrical signals that can be transmitted over distances and then converts received signals back into sounds.
The right to obtain or make use of or take advantage of something (as services or membership); the right to enter.  Also, an act or means of approaching.
The act of going from one place to another.
Voluntary cooperation of the patient in following a prescribed regimen.
The quality of being able to perform; a quality that permits or facilitates achievement or accomplishment.

Property.preferredDefinition: Predetermined sets of questions used to collect data - clinical data, social status, occupational group, etc. The term is often applied to a self-completed survey instrument.:Complete; having every necessary or normal part or component or step; or having come or been brought to a conclusion.:Criteria to determine eligibility of patients for medical care programs and services.

Concepts.definition: To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion.
The act of determining if a subject is suitable for enrollment in a study according specific protocol criteria and procedures.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Access to telephone or willin
ReferenceDocuments.description: Access to telephone or willingness to travel to NCORP site for each of the three interviewer-administered Structured Questionnaires
